author: Simon Chandler
title: Hantavirus: The Faux ‘Pandemic’ That’s Freaking Out All Your Friends
description: A Chinese man infected with the rodent-borne hantavirus has died, causing the internet to begin panicking about another global pandemic. The post Hantavirus: The Faux ‘Pandemic’ That’s Freaking Out All Your Friends appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• A man who died on a bus in China tested positive for the rodent-borne hantavirus.
  • Authorities tested the bus other passengers, prompting fears of another coronavirus-like global pandemic.
  • The hantavirus disease is highly fatal. Luckily… [+4052 chars]
